heroTitle: Create, Manage, and Take Exams Online - Securely and Easily
heroDesc: A complete solution for teachers to create exams and for students to participate, with geo-location, automatic scoring, and time tracking.
feature1Desc:
• Create both Multiple Choice (QCM) and Direct Answer questions
• Attach media like images,audio,or video for richer question context
• Define point values and answer tolerances with ease
feature2Desc:
• Set custom time limits per question or exam
• Student responses are auto-graded instantly
• Final score is calculated and displayed out of 100%
feature3Desc:
• Robust login using email and password
• Student identity and access location verified before exam starts
• Helps reduce cheating with geo-tracking
step1Desc: Sign up quickly as a teacher or student to access your personal dashboard. Secure login ensures your data and role are protected.
step2Desc: Teachers can create QCM or direct questions, add media, and share the exam access link with students instantly.
step3Desc: Students join with the provided access code, complete the exam with a timer, and submit answers in a clean, user-friendly interface.
step4Desc: Exams are scored automatically. Students receive instant feedback and teachers can monitor performance — no manual correction needed.
